pullrequest.title: Fix ign transport dependencies for gz11/default branch

content.raw:
I think the following is a simpler diff, which installs both sets of dependencies (cmake1/cmake2, msgs2/msgs3) on bionic for both transport5 and transport6

~~~
diff -r 9c2ce72ef9cb jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh
--- a/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh	Wed Sep 26 15:14:56 2018 +0000
+++ b/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh	Wed Sep 26 11:16:19 2018 -0700
@@ -556,7 +556,7 @@
                                 libignition-cmake1-dev \\
                                 libignition-msgs2-dev"
     if [[ ${DISTRO} != 'xenial' ]]; then
-      export IGN_TRANSPORT_DEPENDENCIES="${IGN_TRANSPORT_NO_IGN_DEPENDENCIES} \\
+      export IGN_TRANSPORT_DEPENDENCIES="${IGN_TRANSPORT_IGN_DEPENDENCIES} \\
                                   libignition-cmake2-dev \\
                                   libignition-msgs3-dev"
     fi
~~~
content.html:
I think the following is a simpler diff, which installs both sets of dependencies (cmake1/cmake2, msgs2/msgs3) on bionic for both transport5 and transport6

diff -r 9c2ce72ef9cb jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh
--- a/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh   Wed Sep 26 15:14:56 2018 +0000
+++ b/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh   Wed Sep 26 11:16:19 2018 -0700
@@ -556,7 +556,7 @@
                                 libignition-cmake1-dev \\
                                 libignition-msgs2-dev"
     if [[ ${DISTRO} != 'xenial' ]]; then
-      export IGN_TRANSPORT_DEPENDENCIES="${IGN_TRANSPORT_NO_IGN_DEPENDENCIES} \\
+      export IGN_TRANSPORT_DEPENDENCIES="${IGN_TRANSPORT_IGN_DEPENDENCIES} \\
                                   libignition-cmake2-dev \\
                                   libignition-msgs3-dev"
     fi
